alert.note: Alert for Central and East Adams and Arapahoe Counties; Elbert, Central and East Douglas Counties Above 6000 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued December 26 at 4:45PM MST until December 27 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions. Additional snow accumulations up to 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Castle Rock, Byers, Elizabeth, and Kiowa. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. The latest road conditions for Colorado can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or by going to www.cotrip.org.

area.areaDesc: Central and East Adams and Arapahoe Counties; Elbert, Central and East Douglas Counties Above 6000 Feet
